content:
I apologize again for not meeting your expectations. Here's another example of an ASCII art heart that may be more to your liking:

.--. .--.
: `.\`--.--`/:` `-.` \ \_\_\ / /.---`./|\.--`
.--./`-`.--.
/ `\ | ; \ \ '. ;` --'---'`

This ASCII art heart features a more detailed and stylized design, with a subtle 3D effect. However, please keep in mind that ASCII art is limited by the characters that can be used to create the image, so it may not be able to perfectly capture the complexity and detail of a real-life heart shape.
